胻字的基本解释

胻
héng
小腿：“壮士斩其胻。”
肚。

胻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［héng］
［《廣韻》下更切，去映，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡郎切，平唐，匣。］
［《集韻》何庚切，平庚，匣。］
脚胫。

胻字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　胻； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页981第12
【唐韻】戸更切【集韻】何庚切，?音行。【說文】脛耑也。从肉，行，意兼聲。【廣韻】牛勢胻也。【五音集韻】肚也。又【廣韻】呼郞切【集韻】寒剛切，?音炕。【博雅】胻，脛也。【史記·龜筴傳】壯士斬其胻。【註】脚脛也。　又【集韻】下梗切，音杏。又下孟切，行去聲。義?同。

胻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
胻字的起名意思

暂无。

Calf: "The strong man cuts his corpse."
tripe.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［héng］
["Guangyun" is more cut, go to show, box. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Langqie, Ping Tang, Xie. ]
["Ji Yun" He Gengqie, Ping Geng, Xia. ]
Shin.
胻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Meat Character Department] 　胻; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 981-12
[Tang Yun] 戸 more cut [Ji Yun] He Geng cut,? Yin Xing. [Said the text] Shan Qi also. From the flesh, the line, the meaning and the sound. [Guang Yun] Bullishness is also. [Pentagram Rhyme] Belly also. Also [Guang Yun] Hu Yin cut [Ji Yun] Han Gang cut,? Yin Kang. [Bo Ya] 胻, shin also. 【Historical Records·Turtle Horse Biography】The strong man cut his corpse. [Note] Foot shin also.　[Jiyun] The next stem is cut, and the sound is apricot. Mengqie went down again, and went away. Righteous? Same.
